project.description: This job configured to run build from 192.168.56.84 server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CHANGELIST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Changelist on which the QA Build should happen

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ ${CHANGELIST} -eq 0 ]; then echo "Invalid Changelist" exit 1 fi
source /opt/builder/.bash_profile cd /opt/build/src/razor_yslnprplus/build_scripts source /opt/build/src/razor_yslnprplus/build_scripts/build.conf p4 sync //builds/ysl/nprplus/commonyslbuild.sh #sh -x ci_commonyslbuild.sh build ${CHANGELIST} sh -x commonyslbuild.sh build ${CHANGELIST}
echo BUILD_NUMBER=`cat build.properties | grep Build_Number | cut -d "=" -f2`
cd /opt/build/src/razor_yslnprplus/ echo "BUILD_NUMBER=`cat build_scripts/build.properties | grep Build_Number | cut -d "=" -f2`" > bldno.properties

hudson.plugins.sonar.SonarRunnerBuilder.properties:
sonar.projectKey=my:YSLNprPlus sonar.projectName=YSLNprPlus sonar.scm.disabled=false sonar.projectVersion=1.0.0 sonar.perforce.port=192.168.210.178:16060 sonar.perforce.username=builder sonar.perforce.password.secured=h@ndsFr33 sonar.perforce.clientName=blr-bld-jenkins3.builder.yslnprplus sonar.sources=modules/APIGateway,modules/jdbcservice,modules/configservice,modules/logging,modules/security,modules/dom,modules/domx,modules/util-filtering,modules/yccdom,modules/common,modules/RestBridge,modules/cacheservice,modules/cachesupportutil,modules/notifications,modules/LuceneService,modules/framework/gen,modules/MQservice,modules/mongoservice,modules/yccdomx,modules/core-services/authentication-crypto-services,modules/core-services/authentication-services,modules/core-services/context.definition.service,modules/core-services/core.support.common,modules/core-services/core.support.util,modules/core-services/session.services,modules/core-services/core.validation.services sonar.java.binaries=/tmp/empty
sonar.java.binaries=modules/dapi/target/classes sonar.jacoco.reportPath=modules/dapi/target/jacoco.exec sonar.dynamicAnalysis=reuseReports sonar.java.coveragePlugin=jacoco sonar.jacoco.reportMissing.force.zero=true
